name: Princess Zyrantha
entry: Zyranthia is Tharagon's eldest prince, a master of storms and lightning. Known for her tactical genius, she leads the Wyrmclaw's aerial assaults, unleashing thunderous wrath upon Akanul's defenses. His control over the skies makes him a formidable adversary, capable of decimating fleets with a single tempest.
title: The Azure Tempest
